incidents.message: Start time : 07/04/2022 14:30 UTC End time : 07/04/2022 18:30 UTC Service impact : During this operation, we encounted various services failure like : - Failed to apply catalog - Failed to open TCP connection to eu.api.ovh.com:443 (getaddrinfo: Name or service not known). A rollback was performed by our team that help to fix this issue. All services are available now. Service improvement : In a process of continuous improvement, OVHCloud Network team will update configuration on network devices (SYD location). As part of this scheduled maintenance.

incidents.message: Start Time : 07/04/2022 17:53 UTC End Time : 07/04/2022 18:52 UTC Service impact : Following an error occurred during this maintenance Incident link: we encounted various services failure like : - Failed to apply catalog: - Failed to open TCP connection to eu.api.ovh.com:443 (getaddrinfo: Name or service not known). Our team has performed a rollback that allowed the restoration of all services. All services are now operational again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
